Package model

Class Room<E extends Booking>

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Room<E>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassRoom, LabRoom
    public abstract class Room<E extends Booking>
extends java.lang.Object
    implements the rooms which implement a List of bookings and all the methods to work on said bookings. also implements a generic

      • verifyOverlappings

        public boolean verifyOverlappings​(E oldBooking,
                                  E newBooking)
        checks if the new booking overlaps with any booking based on if the new ending hour is greater or not, if the date is different check as if it was new
        Parameters:
        oldBooking - booking to be edited
        newBooking - the new booking
        Returns:
        true if there's any overlap with another booking, false if there's no overlap and it can be edited
